item.title: Visualising 2 billion pixel rasters with datashader and xarray
item.description: This post looks at visualising large raster datasets with Datashader and xarray.

item.title: Essential packages for geospatial analysis in python
item.description: Python is fast becoming the defacto standard for geospatial work – primarily because of its great ecosystem of packages, but also probably whatever you want to do someone has posted an answer for it on stackoverflow with attached python code. To save you some of that trouble below is a collection of “essential”" packages for everything geospatial in python.
